EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 370 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
VICINITY 35-00N 013-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
3906 5908 4409, FAX: 3906 592 2737, 3906 5908 4793.
